body: We're all already in prison, @Sias-Chan. Some of us just don't know it yet.

Well this is a first from what I can recall... Chiguchi Miri made a colored opening act, he didn't even do that on the last volume...

to toad16, I don't think they do the entire thing, just a select few from what I've chekced
Sexy lolis. I especially wanna fuck Ponsuke's and Maeshima Ryou's lolis.
Takamichi's covers are such a blessing. Not even in a sexual way either, just the colors and landscapes and scenes are on point.
